edu.example.embSys.mma.config
Class ConfigApp

java.lang.Object
  edu.example.embSys.mma.config.ConfigApp

public class ConfigApp
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the application configuration like the sensor-sampling-time, the output-folder for the captured data (same folder at the host-PC and at target-Smartphone), the “Simulation-Mode”-flag etc..

Version:
1.0
Author:
Dionysios Satikidis (dionysios.satikidis@gmail.com)
